tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_photography_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    photographer_name VARCHAR(50),
    session_date DATE,
    session_time TIME,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    client_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    booking_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE photography_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    photographer_id INT,
    client_name VARCHAR(50),
    session_date DATE,
    session_time TIME,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_photography_sessions (
    session_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    photographer_name VARCHAR(50),
    session_date DATE,
    session_time TIME,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE booking (
    booking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT REFERENCES fashion_photography_sessions(session_id),
    client_id INT REFERENCES clients(client_id),
    booking_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    photographer_id INT,
    client_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME
);
